TopicTitle: Joystick axis not recognized in gameplay

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

since the latest KSP update I have some problems with my joystick. It worked all time until now. However, I am using the T.Flight X from thrustmaster. I am able to assign all axes as well as the thruttle control in my settings. Then ingame it does not act according to my input anymore. Has somebody similar problems or actually found a fix?

Best,

Maxair

Edited October 26, 2019 by Maxair

I've run out of ideas. Which extensions do you use? As not everyone seems to have that problem.
